actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt operators of punchboards from the occupational tax on wagering.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt punchboard operators from the occupational tax on wagering. Defines "punchboard" as a board used in a type of wagering in which entitlement to a prize is determined by the punching or drawing of numbers or other symbols from holes or other receptacles of uniform size in such board.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt operators of punchboards from the occupational tax on wagering.
